==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=鸾铃}}

===Etymology===
[[鸞]] (a [[mythical]] [[bird]] [[similar]] to a [[phoenix]]) + [[鈴]] ([[bell]])
: The sound of the bells was said to sound similar to the cry of this mythical bird.
